alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 11:59PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Ziebach, northeastern Meade and southeastern Perkins Counties through 1230 AM MDT... At 1159 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Faith, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Red Elm and Iron Lightning around 1210 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dupree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach
